text: Francis Conn Findlay (April 24, 1930April 8, 2021) was an American Olympic rower and sailor. He won four Olympic medals in those two sports, including two golds in coxed pair. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from California Category:People from Stockton, California
title: Conn Findlay
